name: specswarm-marketplace
description: Complete software development lifecycle with spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.0.0-alpha: Consolidating SpecLabs into SpecSwarm for unified experience.

plugins.name: specswarm
plugins.description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.0.0-alpha.1: Phase 2 - Integrated SpecLabs orchestration capabilities, feature-level metrics, and multi-type validation. Consolidation in progress.

plugins.name: speclabs
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - All functionality moved to SpecSwarm v3.0.0+. This plugin now provides backward compatibility aliases only (/speclabs:* → /specswarm:*). Aliases will be removed in v3.2.0. Please migrate to SpecSwarm commands.
